EmailTemplate.name: Pivotal Support Update.GSS 7-18-17
EmailTemplate.subject: Did you know On-Demand Services give operators more control?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
JULY 18, 2017 Top Knowledge Base Articles <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/115010184807#topten]]>
Most viewed articles this week: <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/115010184807#topten]]>
- <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/115010184807#topten]]> <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/115010184807#topten]]>Ops Manager On Demand Broker "error starting broker: You cannot change the plan_id of a plan that has existing service instances <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/115008384288]]> - Query GPHDFS external table failed with error "SQL State: 38000" <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/115009524127]]>
See our Knowledge Base <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us]]> for more helpful articles.
Featured Article
On-Demand Services Give Operators More Control <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/115010184807#ondemand]]>
